SELECT dd.RoleName as rolename, ( SELECT CompanyName FROM user_agentcompany ac WHERE ca.CompanyID = ac.CompanyID ) as companyname, ( SELECT CompanyNameEN FROM user_agentcompany ac WHERE ca.CompanyID = ac.CompanyID ) as companynameen, ( SELECT DepartmentName FROM user_department dm WHERE ca.DepartmentID = dm.DepartmentID ) as departmentname, ( SELECT DepartmentNameEN FROM user_department dm WHERE ca.DepartmentID = dm.DepartmentID ) as departmentname, ca.NAME, ca.NameEN, ca.Telephone, ca.Email, ca.License FROM user_companyaccount ca left join ( select r. RoleName, a.AccountID from user_role r right join (select AccountID, RoleID from user_accountrole where AccountID in(select AccountID from user_companyaccount where DepartmentID=1)) a on a.RoleID=r.RoleID) dd on ca.AccountID = dd.AccountID
where DepartmentID=1
